word_mean: 预见：对未来事件的超感官的直觉

sentence.Network_en: Precognition is a form of clairvoyance.
sentence.Network_cn: 预知是超人的洞察力的一种形式。

sentence.Network_en: Combat Precognition . You gain a + 1 insight bonus to AC.
sentence.Network_cn: 战斗预感: 你的AC得到+1洞察加值.

sentence.Network_en: Manifester Level: 5 th ; Prerequisites: Craft Psionic Arms and Armor, combat precognition; Market Price: + 1 bonus.
sentence.Network_cn: 显能者等级: 5; 先决条件: “制造灵能武器及防具” 、 “战斗预感”; 交易价格: +1加值.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 3. 预知(precognition)，指事件尚未发生之前即可预见的能力。现象种类超感知觉现象有多种，主要有““、““、“预感“、“心灵致.
...为思维传感]、透视力(Clairvoyance)、预知未来(Precognition)以及回知过去(Retrocognition)的能力。
预字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 预见〖 foresee;predict〗 预见〖 precognition;foresight;prevision〗 预警〖 early-warning〗.
另，濒死体验有获预知能力(Precognition)者，如埃尔萨色尔?费拉里诺(Elsaesser Valarino)博士所著《生命的另一面：濒死体验探索》 …

list.abs: 的（clairvoyant）以及预知的（precognitive）能力。13有时耶稣的陈述是预言

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin praecognitio(n-), based on Latin cognoscere 'know'

means.word_mean: 1. knowledge of an event before it occurs

auth_sentence.content: Precognition is irrelevant to the right now, though.
auth_sentence.res_content: Precognition is irrelevant to the right now, though.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Precognition is irrelevant to the right now, though.

auth_sentence.content: He must have had some precognition of his own end.
auth_sentence.res_content: He must have had some precognition of his own end.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He must have had some precognition of his own end.

auth_sentence.content: Jung was...very preoccupied with precognition and the occult.
auth_sentence.res_content: Jung was...very preoccupied with precognition and the occult.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jung was...very preoccupied with precognition and the occult.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可辨识的, 可以审理的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cogn知道+ize……化+able可以……的→cognizable可辨识的
cogn知道+ize……化+ant表形容词→cognizant认知的
pre预先+cogn知道+ition表名词→预先知道→预知
re再+cogn知道+ize表动词→再次知道→认出来
